Matt Ittigson writes:
> I really like the Heritrix GUI.  The JMX integration is a great way to
> track the progress of the spider from other processes.  The coming
> clustered spidering is a way to go from, say, 7M seeds to 70M seeds. 
> We use the ARC files on the backend and have written a module that
> pulls links out of Heritrix in the way we need 'em.  And we've used
> Heritrix to get to the point that we had 7M seeds.

That's a good enough reason to continue using it! Your idea sounded
fine to me: a replacement scope and frontier seem to be in order.

-- 
Tom Emerson                                          Basis Technology Corp.
